page.title: 08BOY IN POP GROUP'S VIDEO
page.content: My name is Robert Mead,I live at the Rose & Crown Gt. Horkesley.I was asked by Mark Wilkinson who is a commercial artist to model for the cover of a record called Kayleigh which reached No.2 in the hit parade in June 1985 by a band called Marillion.I was also asked to go to West Berlin to make a video with the group which accompanied the record and helped it become a hit.I spent 2 days in Berlin and very much enjoyed it.Since the record the group released an albumn called Misplaced Childhood which reached No.3 in its first week after being released.On the cover of which I was wearing a red Victorian military tunic and blue trousers and was carrying a magpie on my arm. Due to the success of the record and albmn I was asked to appear on the cover of the groups next record named Laveder.
